args:
Determine whether this social media post from Donald Trump contains a personal insult to Kamala Harris's intelligence. Simply return "yes" or "no".
content: Kamala Harris supports the Environmental Extremists’ “NET-ZERO” Energy Policy - A Radical Left Agenda to abolish Coal, Oil, and Natural Gas, and plunge MILLIONS into Poverty. Net Zero Lunatics are currently destroying the Economies of many other Countries, including the U.K. Their Radical, Self-Destructive Policy has led the U.K. to the Worst Economic Growth since 1780, now causing Economic Chaos, Destruction, Riots, and Death in the streets of British Cities. In the United States, Net Zero Fanatics like Kamala Harris want to shut down Power Plants, even as the cost of Energy and Electricity is up 30 to 50% and climbing - NOT IF I’M PRESIDENT! I will cut your Energy costs in HALF, and Net Zero will be DEAD on Day One!
